name: Male Pattern Boldness
description:
Keyboard controls - arrows, z,x,c

Gamepad controls - thumbstick, A, LB, RB

Oh no you're losing your hair! But perhaps you can use something around to cover it up...

Grab and place with z. Rotate with x, c

A game made for Ludum Dare 50 in 72 hours by:

Ollie Powell, Adam Butcher, Tom Carrell, James Pearson
